name: ChargePoint
goal: ChargePoint brings electric vehicle (EV) charging to more people and places than ever before with the worldâ€™s largest and most open EV charging network. We design, build and support all of the technology that powers this network, from charging station hardware to energy management software to a mobile app. Our work transforms transportation and energy use by helping more people choose to drive electric.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Energy, Environment, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Chargepoint is interested to follow and influence any policy that will effect our activities in Europe, i.e.: EU infrastructure policies, EV policies, Cars and Co2 regulation, Energy efficient Building Directive, Trade and Energy Taxation policy.
